ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: factions
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, it can still be easier if you aren t kos. But you have to do a LOT of killing. I found that killing the orcs, gnolls, and bandits (Dalishea, Brenon, and
ygData.messageBody:
Well, it can still be easier if you aren't kos. But you have to do a LOT of killing. I found that killing the orcs, gnolls, and bandits (Dalishea, Brenon, and Greth Trucksorn) in Highpass is good faction-- and you can make some decent coin. Killing the 3 bandits I named raises your faction with Highpass Guards, Karana Residents, and Circle of Unseen Hands. Only thing it lowers is your faction with bandits.
luv,
-Su

======== At 2004-03-15, 02:43:00 you wrote: ========

I have a friend that ran a Rogue and was no worse that dubious in
ever city but Cabalis. He also has a Troll that can go in most light
cities. It's a long and hard road to follow, and as has been said
PoK makes it a moot point.

Tuldayen Grimblade
Outrider of Tunare
Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm
